BCC_GOAL_DESCRIPTION.message: Complete at least 1 BCC activity for the operational area

IRS_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Visit each structure in the operational area and attempt to spray

IRS_GOAL_DESCRIPTION.message: Spray structures in the operational area

BEDNET_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Visit 100% of residential structures in the operational area and provide nets

BEDNET_GOAL_MEASURE.message: Percent of residential structures received nets

BLOOD_SCREENING_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Visit all residential structures (100%) within a 1 km radius of a confirmed index case and test each registered person

REGISTER_FAMILY_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Register all families & family members in all residential structures enumerated (100%) within the operational area

REGISTER_FAMILY_ACTIVITY_GOAL_MEASURE.message: Percent of residential structures with full family registration

LARVAL_DIPPING_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Perform a minimum of three larval dipping activities in the operational area

LARVAL_DIPPING_GOAL_MEASURE.message: Number of larval dipping activities completed

MOSQUITO_COLLECTION_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Set a minimum of three mosquito collection traps and complete the mosquito collection process

MOSQUITO_COLLECTION_GOAL_MEASURE.message: Number of mosquito collection activities completed

A1_DESCRIPTION.message: Indigenous case recorded within the last year.

A2_DESCRIPTION.message: No indigenous case during the last year, but withing the last 3 years.

B1_DESCRIPTION.message: Receptive area but no indigenous cases within the last 3 years.
